phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
And it looks like the client really appreciated it.
Well, we finished it up real quick since I was there.
And what makes you say that, jerk?
Just thinking about how you were nothing but extra baggage for this job.
How about I teach you what kind of extra baggage I am?
That made no sense at all.
I am the one who says that!
That is right, we can do it!
Let us go for even more who-knows-what!!
The door to mystery is right in front of us
This excitement gets my heart racing
Why cannot I see tomorrow, I wonder?
The only part leveling up is my curiosity
We cannot just throw away our daily life together, right?
Living itself will be our training!
Let us search for even more who-knows-what!
We cannot be satisfied with just the normal answers
We will do our best living our life
Um, I hate to interrupt your conversation, but...
I was the one who chose this request on my own, originally...
So why did everyone come with me?
Because we are Fairy Tail's strongest team!
Put together me, Happy, Erza, and underpants-man, and there is no job we cannot do!
I am not crying, and I am not named Oopy!
And I have ended up hurting my comrade.
I cannot allow this to continue...
For now, would you please punch me?
That is not the punch-line I had in mind...
I guess they do not know yet.
We are drawing an unusual amount of attention.
I have got a bad feeling about this.
The guild should not look like that.
I hate to say it, but they got us.
This is Fairy Tail's first basement floor.
It is normally used for storage, but it is been turned into a temporary beer hall.
We have always been on bad terms with Phantom.
Maybe we should go crush them.
Gramps, what are you sittin' around here for?
Master, do not you understand the situation we are in?
It is not something to get so riled up about.
That is all those half-wits got in'them?
Attacking the guild when nobody was here?
Who would take pleasure in that?
It seems the attack happened in the middle of the night.
So that is why no one is injured.
I suppose it is one small thing to be thankful for.
If they can only manage a sneak-attack, we should not even give those bastards the time of day.
They are not worth our time!
I will not be satisfied until we go and crush these guys!
Until the upstairs is repaired, we will take work requests from here.
This is not time for doing jobs!
I have had about enough out of you!
Why are you okay with this, Gramps?
This is just as hard for the master, you know.
But outright conflict between guilds is forbidden by the Council.
Well, they are the ones that attacked first!
If that is how the master feels...
There is nothing we can do.
Things have really gotten complicated, have not they?
Do not blame me if you fall in!
Phantom is famous for not getting along with Fairy Tail.
I actually fretted trying to decide which one I wanted to join.
After all, their reputation is nearly as nuts as Fairy Tail's!
But I think I made the right decision joining here.
There is a lot of you all!
The incident with Phantom means that they have come to this town.
It is possible they have looked up where everyone lives.
So it will be safer if we stay in groups.
Everyone is having sleepovers here and there today!
You are a girl of a certain age,
and even I would be a bit uncomfortable staying with just Natsu and Gray.
That is why I have decided to keep you all company.
We are not here to relax!
So Natsu and Gray staying with me was already decided?
Hey, cat over there, what are you...
And Plue, what are you doing?
What is that you are eating?
I am hittin' the hay so pipe down, okay?
I am glad you are enjoying the change of pace in someone else's home...
We are sleeping in the same room, so at least take a bath.
Shall we take a bath together like we used to long ago?
What kind of relationship do you guys have?!
That is not the kind of strength it means!
Would not it be better for you to stay with Laki at the girl's dorm?
There is nothing to fear with the three of us!
They have all made themselves way too much at home...
You even requip to change clothes?
I wonder why Phantom suddenly attacked?
We have had a lot of smaller skirmishes before this,
but never such a direct attack.
If Gramps were not such a scardey-cat we could just destroy the punks!
He is one of the Ten Wizard Saints, you know.
What do you think you are reading so nonchalantly?
I want to know what happens next!
Levy-chan is going to be my first reader.
And what is that hand for, huh?
Anyway, you mentioned Ten Wizard Saints?
It is a title bestowed by the Chairman of the Magic Council to the greatest ten wizards on the continent.
The master of Phantom, Jose, is also one of them.
The only thing Phantom's got are numbers!
That is not true, you know.
The master and Mira-chan want to avoid a fight because they know the consequences of two guilds battling each other.
It is to help preserve the peace of the entire world of magic!
If it came to blows, mutual destruction is ensured.
Our offensive powers are about equal.
Master Makarov is said to be on par with Master Jose, also one of the ten wizard saints.
Then there are the Element 4, their S-class level wizards.
Our biggest worry is Iron Gajeel.
He is the one I believe is responsible for the attack on the guild.
There are ones other than Natsu?
So does that mean he like... eats iron and stuff?
I heard you attacked Fairy Tail, Gajeel!
I bet they are all feelin' really blue right about now!
Do not talk to me when I am eating.
Who cares about those Fairy Butts?
We are more powerful than them.
That trash will not act from just that.
So I left them an extra little present.
Just make sure to keep that one alive, please.
Somebody get them down from there!
I can stand being reduced to a run-down beer hall...
But no parent can stand idle while the blood of his children is spilled!
They are also equipped with facilities to treat wizards.
How could Phantom do this to you?
They say you are writing a novel?
The rumor's already made the rounds?
I think I have a good idea who it was that spread it around...
You see, I am hopeless at writing, but I love reading books!
If you do not mind, would you let me read your book?
It is not something I would want to show other people...
Is not the point of writing to let other people read it?
They say that being an author is like showing off your butt to everyone, right?
You will not get anywhere being embarrassed.
And I am not talking about your butt...
That might be fine, too, though...
I am still working on it...
Then when it is finished, can I be the first person to read it?
And she worked so hard for us back then...
Oak Town, in the North-East of the Kingdom of Fiore.
In the center, towering above the old castle town, is a branch of the Phantom Lord guild.
Those Fairy Butts are all busted up!
And I hear that Gajeel went and did in three more of'them!
So, let us go do some work!
And on our way back, we will pluck off a few Fairy wings!
You laid hands on this monster's children!
Do not think any human laws will protect you!
And the rank-and-file are not bad either!
So these are Fairy Tail wizards?
What the hell is that supposed to mean?
So what if I am a cat?
Where are Gajeel and the Element 4?
Laxus and Mystogan are sitting things out, huh?
But things are going pretty much according to Master Jose's plan.
They rage pretty good for trash...
Levy-chan and her team need someone to care for them, so I guess that is me.
Non, non, non, non, non, non, non!
With non of 3, 3, 7, I say to you, bonjour!
Juvia-sama, you must not abandon your job now.
My monocle, it whispers to me, yes.
It tells me that this mademoiselle is our beloved cible.
Oh, so it was this girl?
I do apologize for the late introduction.
My name is Sol, one of the Element 4.
People call me Sol of the Land...
We two have come to collect you for the great Phantom Lord!
And this is the rain-woman of the Element 4.
People call her Juvia of the Deep.
How dare you do such a thing to Levy-chan!
With non of 3, I correct your error!
Destroying your guild and attacking Levy-sama was all the work of Gajeel-sama!
Well, it is true that all of us in the guild were for the idea, however...
Juvia's water lock cannot be broken.
Because it is Juvia's job to bring back...
Now that I have eaten, I am all revved up!
I will blow you all away!
Wood Make: The Distance Between the Two is Forever!
I will leave the rest here to you guys!
Jose is likely on the top floor...
I will put him out of commission for good...
Now that the biggest threat's gone,
maybe I should mix it up a bit?
chasing after your profile left only in my revolving dreams
You said, I never want to see your face again, when you left me
But the tears on your cheek said it all
Every time you felt like you would be swallowed up in the waves of contradiction
you always held back your tears, you know?
What a strong person, they said, but everyone overestimated you
and before you knew it you lost sight of who you really are
Then the sun I thought would always be near me collapsed
Rubbing out the truths and the lies of one day, altogether
still, ironically, chasing after your profile in my revolving dreams
We forgot to take Lucy with us!
She might be angry that we left her behind this time.
She is real scary when she is angry...
Let us bring her something back as a present!
But I think she would rather we pay her rent for her.
Wait, I just heard Lucy's voice!
Maybe they are hounding her about the rent?
